name: Doctor Nurse
description:
Doctor Nurse is a game about managing a small hospital. Your patients will arrive with one sickness, but they may get a second or third desease while waiting for a free bed. Your task is to sort them and heal as many as possible! In the end of the day, you can't cure everyone.

(Be warned: some of the humor may only work if you understand german)

This is a two day Gamejam project from  2017

Gamedesign and lead programming: Nicolas Eder

Leveldesign and programming: Tristan Nitzsche

3D Art:  Oswald 

2D Art, Sound and original Idea: Roman Stadlhuber
